page.title: 12BACTON GAS TERMINAL
page.content: My dad told me about the place where he works.Bacton Gas Terminal processes the gas from all the off shore gas platforms.Each platform has several gas wells.The gas wells are pipes that go about 1.5miles beneath the sea be Gas from the platforms flows down 30in diameter pipes to Bacton.The platforms vary from about 15miles to 70miles from Bacton.At Bacton the gas is refridgerated to about-10degrees F. This removes liquid condensate from the gas and insures that the gas is dry when it enters the National gas pipe network.The condensate is sent to an oil refinery where it is converted into solvent such as white spirit,paint thinners,toluene and petrol.Computers are used to control the production of gas. The North Sea Gas industry provides many people with work round here.
